P38CSN.1.description: Support for various gender, family, and reproductive policies (full set)
P38CSN.1.question: Do you agree or disagree with the following statements?

values.1: Maternity leave should be available for both mothers and fathers
values.2: Women should have a reserved quota of executive jobs in private companies
values.3: Women should have a reserved quota of executive jobs in the public sector
values.4: Schools should provide young people with access to birth control methods
values.5: Abortion should be legal in cases of rape or incest
values.6: Companies should offer either subsidies or facilities to care for workers' children
values.7: Women without a pension should receive a solidarity pension in old age

P38CSN.2.description: Support for gender, education, and family policies (subset)
P38CSN.2.question: Do you agree or disagree with the following statements?

values.2: Women should have a reserved quota of executive jobs in private companies
values.3: Women should have a reserved quota of executive jobs in the public sector
values.4: Schools should provide young people with access to birth control methods
values.5: Abortion should be legal in cases of rape or incest
values.6: Companies should offer either subsidies or facilities to care for workers' children
values.7: Women without a pension should receive a solidarity pension in old age

P38CSN.3.description: Support for public sector gender quotas and family policies
P38CSN.3.question: Do you agree or disagree with the following statements?

values.3: Women should have a reserved quota of executive jobs in the public sector
values.4: Schools should provide young people with access to birth control methods
values.5: Abortion should be legal in cases of rape or incest
values.6: Companies should offer either subsidies or facilities to care for workers' children
values.7: Women without a pension should receive a solidarity pension in old age

P38CSN.4.description: Support for education, abortion rights, and family policies

values.4: Schools should provide young people with access to birth control methods

values.6: Companies should offer either subsidies or facilities to care for workers' children

P38CSN.5.description: Support for abortion rights and family care policies
P38CSN.5.question: Do you agree or disagree with the following statements?

values.5: Abortion should be legal in cases of rape or incest
values.6: Companies should offer either subsidies or facilities to care for workers' children

P38CSN.6.description: Support for workplace childcare and old-age pensions for women
P38CSN.6.question: Do you agree or disagree with the following statements?

values.6: Companies should offer either subsidies or facilities to care for workers' children
values.7: Women without a pension should receive a solidarity pension in old age

P38CSN.7.description: Support for solidarity pensions for older women without a pension
P38CSN.7.question: Do you agree or disagree that women without a pension should receive a solidarity pension in old age?

values.7: Women without a pension should receive a solidarity pension in old age

S24.description: Assessed socioeconomic level of the interviewee
S24.question: Based on the quality of the dwelling, furniture, and the interviewee’s general appearance, how would you rate the interviewee’s socioeconomic level?
